title: New: Killøtto – KPRNKS
body:
If Darragh David Nolan (aka **Sacred animals**) and Victor Ferreira (aka **Sun Glitters**) suggest you listen to something on Facebook, do it, because it’s only going to reap hugely enjoyable rewards.

This debut cut from Liverpool based artist **Killøtto** is a slowly unraveling, sleaze ball of a track, oozing and branching throughout the 5 minutes of music; making for an unnerving and subtly gruesome listen.

This debut cut from Liverpool based artist Killøtto is a slowly unraveling, sleaze ball of a track, oozing and branching throughout the 5 minutes \[…\]
